reviewtext: This stopped my problem with my wireless router kicking my hard wired connection.I had to restart both routers often.Now I have a dedicated wire to 2 bedrooms, AT&T; Micro-cell and wireless router!Better than I thought, haven't been kicked since I hooked it up.The 5 ports consists of 1 input and 4 output.I'm very pleased with this switch and highly recommend it.
